original_text: And when he learned that he belonged to Herod's jurisdiction, he sent him over to Herod, who was himself in Jerusalem at that time.
korean_text: 헤롯의 관할에 속한 줄을 알고 헤롯에게 보내니 그 때에 헤롯이 예루살렘에 있더라

sentences.original_text: that he belonged to Herod's jurisdiction
he sent him over to Herod
who was himself in Jerusalem at that time
